creator: g-ole@online.no
text:
Mail example code gives error: "The <fileset> type doesn't support the 
nested "includes" element."

<mail mailhost="smtp.myisp.com" mailport="1025" subject="Test build">
...
    <includes name="**/*.zip"/>
...

Should be:
    <include name="**/*.zip"/>

Thanks for the report.
This is now fixed and will be in the next release of ant.
creator: peterreilly@apache.org
